Battle Bell Ringers' News/Latest

5 November 2002
I just found these on my hard drive!!... Currently looking for a permanent home.

Battle Leaflet  Diagram of church

21 August 2002
The bus for the outing leaves Battle church at 7am (I doubt). I will try to put details of the day here (should anyone care).

21 July 2002
There are still a number of vacancies for the outing to Essex. There will be a small charge involved, to cover costs of the mini-bus and tower donations. Those interested should chat up Paul...

Practices remain well managed and as a result, remain well attended. Most Sundays have 8 bells, and weddings that Simon remembers about have a full band.

8 July 2002
We are doing a mini spring clean for the open day (not that it ever gets untidy!).... We did quite well this year, and raised a good £166.22

:-)
